name: Save The Pencil 2
description:
The long-awaited follow up to the number 1 puzzle game is here, and its bigger and better than ever.

HB and his pencil friends have returned to take on the evil stationery. You'll need your brain, speed and accuracy as you navigate your pencil through tons of puzzles, rotating rulers, firing staplers and turning the evil eraser against his friends!

Improved graphics, sound and game play. You can now interact with enemies as you try to discover secrets, earn achievements and unlock 8 new characters, each with their own abilities and super powers!

Now a universal app, running on both your iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad, with progress sync across devices using iCloud.

Features:
• 75 new levels, regular updates.
• Unlock new characters with special super powers.
• Control enemies and interact with new dot types.
• New power ups aid your progress.
• Universal app, works on both iPhone/iPod Touch and iPad.
• iCloud syncing of progress between device, complete levels on your iPad, and pick up where you left off on your iPhone.
• Improved graphics, including retina support across all devices.
